Message:
“My foolish daughter.
Just give up,
and rest in peace.”

My father’s voice echoes
throughout the inside
of the lake.

...It’s true.
I’m just a tiny, useless kid.

But, I realized something
after I left the village.

To let someone rest
peacefully in their grave,
I gotta make sure they’re
smiling before they go in.

Make them smile,
just like what the Duke does.

Gravekeepers aren’t
bystanders who just
watch over the departed.

We have another
important job—
taking care of everyone
so they can smile!

At that moment,
something dove into the lake.

...That’s right.
You always knew
how to make me smile,
huh Laila?

I rise to my feet
with Laila at my side.
The illusion no longer
had me in its clutches.
